languages.text: "Вы не представляете, насколько сильно я желала услышать эти слова. Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. До тех пор, пока мы не прибудем на Даргонус, я продолжу выполнять наши соглашения".

traits.locale_text: "Вы не представляете, насколько сильно я желала услышать эти слова. Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. До тех пор, пока мы не прибудем на Даргонус, я продолжу выполнять наши соглашения".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."
languages.original_text: "Вы не представляете, насколько сильно я желала услышать эти слова. Благодарю, Вольный Торговец. До тех пор, пока мы не прибудем на Даргонус, я продолжу выполнять наши соглашения".

traits.locale_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honor our agreements until we arrive at Dargonus."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honor our agreements until we arrive at Dargonus."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你无法想象我有多么渴望听到这些话，行商浪人。我对你充满了感激之情。我将继续履行我们之间的协议，直到我们抵达达戈努斯为止。”
languages.original_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: “你无法想象我有多么渴望听到这些话，行商浪人。我对你充满了感激之情。我将继续履行我们之间的协议，直到我们抵达达戈努斯为止。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No puede imaginarse cuánto quería escuchar esas palabras. Comerciante Independiente, le estoy muy agradecida. Seguiré honrando nuestro acuerdo hasta que lleguemos a Dargonus».
languages.original_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: «No puede imaginarse cuánto quería escuchar esas palabras. Comerciante Independiente, le estoy muy agradecida. Seguiré honrando nuestro acuerdo hasta que lleguemos a Dargonus».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉をどれほど聞きたかったか、{name}様には想像もできないでしょう。自由開拓者様には感謝しております。ダルゴナスへ着くまで、協定は守るつもりです」
languages.original_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉をどれほど聞きたかったか、{name}様には想像もできないでしょう。自由開拓者様には感謝しております。ダルゴナスへ着くまで、協定は守るつもりです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr könnt Euch nicht vorstellen, wie sehr ich diese Worte hören wollte. {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich bin Euch sehr dankbar. Ich werde unsere Vereinbarung weiterhin erfüllen, bis wir auf Dargonus eintreffen."
languages.original_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt Euch nicht vorstellen, wie sehr ich diese Worte hören wollte. {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, ich bin Euch sehr dankbar. Ich werde unsere Vereinbarung weiterhin erfüllen, bis wir auf Dargonus eintreffen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point j'avais besoin d'entendre ces mots. {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, vous avez toute ma gratitude. Bien sûr, j'honorerai mes engagements jusqu'à notre arrivée sur Dargonus. »
languages.original_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point j'avais besoin d'entendre ces mots. {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, vous avez toute ma gratitude. Bien sûr, j'honorerai mes engagements jusqu'à notre arrivée sur Dargonus. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu sözleri duymayı ne kadar istediğimi hayal bile edemezsin. Minnettarım Hür Tacir. Dargonus'a ulaşana kadar anlaşmamızın şartlarını yerine getirmeyi sürdüreceğim."
languages.original_text: "You cannot imagine how badly I wanted to hear these words. Rogue Trader, you have my gratitude. I will continue to honour our agreements until we arrive on Dargonus."

traits.locale_text: "Bu sözleri duymayı ne kadar istediğimi hayal bile edemezsin. Minnettarım Hür Tacir. Dargonus'a ulaşana kadar anlaşmamızın şartlarını yerine getirmeyi sürdüreceğim."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
